title: Introducing: Aela Kae
body:
Aela Kae, the Sydney based project of 18 year old Mikaela Grob first appeared a couple of months back on Kailo’s rather fantastic Need Ya, and has since released her first solo outing, Pure Zone.

Self-produced, it’s a worthy introduction, showcasing edgier elements as seen by the likes of Lapsley or Lupa J, whilst also flirting with a poppier sheen, it’s more than enough to get one very excited for what is to come next. Check out Pure Zone below, as well as her Avalanches-esque collaboration with Kailo.
